`,(0,l.jsxs)(n.blockquote,{children:[`
`,(0,l.jsx)(n.p,{children:"Th\u1EADt ra l\xE0 vi\u1EC7c \u201Cnhi\u1EC1u qu\u1ED1c gia c\xF3 tranh ch\u1EA5p c\xE1c th\u1EF1c th\u1EC3\u201D trong khu v\u1EF1c Spralty Island (Tr\u01B0\u1EDDng Sa) v\xE0 \u201CTranh ch\u1EA5p ch\u1EE7 quy\u1EC1n c\u1EE7a Trung Qu\u1ED1c v\xE0 Vi\u1EC7t Nam\u201D \u0111\u1ED1i v\u1EDBi Paracel Island (Ho\xE0ng Sa) ch\xEDnh l\xE0 nguy\xEAn nh\xE2n m\xE0 tr\xEAn ph\u1EA7n m\u1EC1m b\u1EA3n \u0111\u1ED3 c\u1EE7a Google Map, Google Inc, ho\u1EB7c c\xE1c t\u1ED5 ch\u1EE9c li\xEAn quan cung c\u1EA5p b\u1EA3n \u0111\u1ED3 \u0111\xE3 kh\xF4ng s\u1EED d\u1EE5ng c\u1EE5m t\u1EEB \u0111\u1ECBa danh \u201CQu\u1EA7n \u0111\u1EA3o Ho\xE0ng Sa\u201D v\xE0 \u201CQu\u1EA7n \u0111\u1EA3o Ho\xE0ng sa\u201D d\u1EABn t\u1EDBi vi\u1EC7c kh\xF4ng c\xF3 d\u1EEF li\u1EC7u c\u1EE7a 2 Qu\u1EA7n \u0111\u1EA3o tr\u1EF1c thu\u1ED9c Vi\u1EC7t Nam."}),`

`,(0,l.jsx)(n.li,{children:"Gi\u1EA3i ph\xE1p \u1EDF \u0111\xE2y c\u0169ng ch\u01B0a h\u1EB3n l\xE0 \u0111\xE3 t\u1ED1i \u01B0u n\xEAn c\xE1c b\u1EA1n c\xE2n nh\u1EAFc nh\xE9."}),`
`,(0,l.jsx)(n.li,{children:"N\u1EBFu c\xE1c b\u1EA1n c\u1EA7n chi ti\u1EBFt h\u01A1n v\u1EC1 \xFD th\u1EE9 nh\u1EA5t, merge 3 file c\u1EE7a 2 qu\u1EA7n \u0111\u1EA3o Ho\xE0ng Sa v\xE0 Tr\u01B0\u1EDDng Sa v\xE0o v\u1EDBi nhau, th\xEC t\xF4i s\u1EBD vi\u1EBFt ti\u1EBFp 1 b\xE0i m\xF4 t\u1EA3 k\u1EF9 h\u01A1n v\u1EC1 n\xF3."}),`
`,(0,l.jsxs)(n.li,{children:["Trong b\xE0i ti\u1EBFp theo th\xEC t\xF4i s\u1EBD h\u01B0\u1EDBng d\u1EABn v\u1EBD b\u1EA3n \u0111\u1ED3 Vi\u1EC7t Nam \u1EDF mobile ",(0,l.jsx)(n.code,{children:"React Native"})," v\xE0 c\xE1ch t\u1ED1i \u01B0u sao cho kh\xF4ng \u1EA3nh h\u01B0\u1EDFng t\u1EDBi perfomance."]}),`
`,(0,l.jsx)(n.li,{children:"Xin c\u1EA3m \u01A1n c\xE1c \u0111\u1ED9c gi\u1EA3 v\xE0 mong b\xE0i vi\u1EBFt tr\xEAn c\xF3 th\u1EC3 gi\xFAp \xEDch cho m\u1ECDi ng\u01B0\u1EDDi."}),`
`,(0,l.jsx)(n.li,{children:"C\xF3 b\u1EA5t k\u1EF3 th\u1EAFc m\u1EAFc n\xE0o vui l\xF2ng li\xEAn h\u1EC7 v\u1EDBi t\xF4i qua telegram b\xEAn d\u01B0\u1EDBi."}),`
